attributes.action: Save civilian and kids in Gaza, supplies medicines for the hospital.
attributes.additional_details: United Kingdom is great country they have strong and solid voice in united nation and good relations with all Middle East countries.
attributes.background: Asking Israel government to give way for medical help and stopping target kids and civilians unarmed people.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition, a ceasefire has been announced and the Government has confirmed it is sending aid to Gaza

https://www.gov.uk/government/news/uk-aid-package-to-help-provide-emergency-relief-for-civilians-in-gaza--2
